SEARCH
Package org.group7.model.board

Class GoalStretch

java.lang.Object
org.group7.model.board.GoalStretch
All Implemented Interfaces:
IMoveHandler
public class GoalStretch extends Object implements IMoveHandler
The GoalStretch class represents the goal stretch in the game (each player has their own strip of tiles) that the pieces have to go through to reach the goal.

  • Constructor Details

    • GoalStretch

      public GoalStretch(Color color, PieceExtractor handler)
      The constructor of the GoalStretch class.
      Parameters:
      color - The parameter "color" represents the color of the goal-stretch.
      handler - The parameter "handler" represents an object of type PieceExtractor which can transfer pieces from the goal-stretch back to the field (rest of the board).

  • Method Details

    • addPiece

      public void addPiece(Piece p, int index)
      The addPiece function adds a piece to a specific index in the goal stretch, updates the piece's position.
      Specified by:
      addPiece in interface IMoveHandler
      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is of type Piece, which represents a game piece that can be added to the game board.
      index - The `index` parameter represents the position where the `Piece` object `p` should be added.

    • goalStretchMove

      public void goalStretchMove(Piece p, int steps)
      The goalStretchMove function moves a piece on a game board, either to the goal stretch area or to the goal tile.
      Parameters:
      p - The parameter "p" is an object of type "Piece".
      steps - The "steps" parameter represents the number of steps that the piece should move.

      Parameters:
